channel.title: Necrotic | Iron man | HC Iron man | Pets | Custom bosses
channel.description:
[CENTER][url=https://necrotic.org/forums]Necrotic Forums[/url] [url=https://necrotic.org/forums/showthread.php?tid=19]Download Links[/url] [url=https://necrotic.org/home]Server Information[/url] [url=https://necrotic.org/forums/showthread.php?tid=20&pid=21]Screenshot Thread[/url]
[url=https://necrotic.org/home][img]http://i.imgur.com/Y0wN0AA.png[/img][/url]
[SIZE=4]Necrotic is an ambitious and modern take on the traditional RSPS. We are the next big server, in our humble beginning.[/SIZE]
[SIZE=4][u]Server Features[/u][/SIZE]
• 99.9% Uptime, hosted on a dedicated server • 100% Iron Man Mode & Hardcore Iron Man Mode (No Banking) • Website Hiscores • Customized, Unique Home • Custom NPCs • Balanced Custom Items • Yell System • Working Drop Announcements • 100% Shooting Star + Stardust Exchange • Unique Prestige System • Loyalty Point System • Working Rise of The Six • Working Godwars + Nex & Minions • Fully Custom Bosses - Kilik, Crimson, Brandon • Oldschool Wilderness Bosses - Callisto, Vet'ion, Venenatis, Kraken, Scorpia • Regular Bosses - GWD + Nex, Dag. Kings, Frost Drags, Tormented Demons, KBD, Chaos Ele, Slash Bash, Nomad, Kalphite Queen, Pheonix, Bandos Avatar, Glacors, Corp • Fully Custom Minigames - Zombies Minigame, Revenants • 100% Regular Minigames - Pest Control, Duel Arena, Warrior's Guild, Fight Caves • Slayer Log + Drop Log • Well of Good Will • Veteran Benefits • Curses + Standard Prayer • 100% Standard Magic • 100% Ancients Magic • 100% Vengance • Over 120 Achievements with Powerful Rewards • Working Skillcapes + Emotes • Summoning Familiars + Working Effects • Working Clan Chats + Lootshare • Working Ignore + Friends Lists • 100% Price Check • A Custom Take on Dungeoneering • Max & Completionist Cape
[u][SIZE=4]Client Features[/SIZE][/u]
• Fixed + Resizeable + Fullscreen modes • Working Sound System • Push-Notifications for Private-Messages • Multiple Gameframes • HD + SD Modes • Oldschool + Modern Function Keys • Oldschool + Modern Health Bars •Oldschool + Modern Hitboxes • Display Hitpoints Above head • Display Usernames Above Head • Constitution Toggle • Custom Models + NPC Models
[u][SIZE=4]Screenshots[/SIZE][/u] [img]http://i.imgur.com/sLZpOdi.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ASnQyfV.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/PByUSLZ.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/19NrSwX.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/VGpGBSw.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/9cfsXB9.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/I8ZUp4L.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZgVwR5a.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/obOpjWh.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/o59AogZ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Uz9D835.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/bAcrAzw.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/hLM4w78.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/nfOBNoZ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Tpqp4dP.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Q0t7LVL.png[/img]

item.title: Necrotic | Iron man | HC Iron man | Pets | Custom bosses
item.dc:creator: @SurrealRSPS SurrealRSPS
item.description:
@SurrealRSPS wrote:

[CENTER]Necrotic Forums
Download Links
Server Information
Screenshot Thread

[SIZE=4]Necrotic is an ambitious and modern take on the traditional RSPS. We are the next big server, in our humble beginning.[/SIZE]

[SIZE=4]Server Features[/SIZE]

• 99.9% Uptime, hosted on a dedicated server
• 100% Iron Man Mode & Hardcore Iron Man Mode (No Banking)
• Website Hiscores
• Customized, Unique Home
• Custom NPCs
• Balanced Custom Items
• Yell System
• Working Drop Announcements
• 100% Shooting Star + Stardust Exchange
• Unique Prestige System
• Loyalty Point System
• Working Rise of The Six
• Working Godwars + Nex & Minions
• Fully Custom Bosses - Kilik, Crimson, Brandon
• Oldschool Wilderness Bosses - Callisto, Vet’ion, Venenatis, Kraken, Scorpia
• Regular Bosses - GWD + Nex, Dag. Kings, Frost Drags, Tormented Demons, KBD, Chaos Ele, Slash Bash, Nomad, Kalphite Queen, Pheonix, Bandos Avatar, Glacors, Corp
• Fully Custom Minigames - Zombies Minigame, Revenants
• 100% Regular Minigames - Pest Control, Duel Arena, Warrior’s Guild, Fight Caves
• Slayer Log + Drop Log
• Well of Good Will
• Veteran Benefits
• Curses + Standard Prayer
• 100% Standard Magic
• 100% Ancients Magic
• 100% Vengance
• Over 120 Achievements with Powerful Rewards
• Working Skillcapes + Emotes
• Summoning Familiars + Working Effects
• Working Clan Chats + Lootshare
• Working Ignore + Friends Lists
• 100% Price Check
• A Custom Take on Dungeoneering
• Max & Completionist Cape

[SIZE=4]Client Features[/SIZE]

• Fixed + Resizeable + Fullscreen modes
• Working Sound System
• Push-Notifications for Private-Messages
• Multiple Gameframes
• HD + SD Modes
• Oldschool + Modern Function Keys
• Oldschool + Modern Health Bars
•Oldschool + Modern Hitboxes
• Display Hitpoints Above head
• Display Usernames Above Head
• Constitution Toggle
• Custom Models + NPC Models
